comments:
When the relative value view is up in the Simulation perspective, switch to the Designer perspective and then click on something in an editor (e.g., edit a Sequencer).  It seems that clicking on something other than a graph Node causes an NPE in the adaption process that starts in the RelativeValueHistoryPlotter
